Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The hardware controller for driving data path.

      class  Controller.ADD_LHS_B

      AND_LHS_B Logical AND together left hand register value and B into C

      EOR_LHS_B Logical OR together left hand register value and B into C

      Fetch0 Store the program counter in the memory address register
      class  Controller.Fetch1
      FETCH1 Increments the program counter and loads (previous pc) to memory data register
      class  Controller.Fetch2
      FETCH2 Moves the data from the memory data register to the instruction register
      class  Controller.LDUR2
      LDUR2 Load C into MA
      class  Controller.LDUR3
      LDUR3 Load main memory

      LOAD_DEST_C Move C into destination register
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR
      LOAD_PC_PTR Move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_EQ
      LOAD_PC_PTR_EQ If Z == 1, then move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_GE
      LOAD_PC_PTR_GE If N == V, then move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_GT
      LOAD_PC_PTR_GT If Z == 0 AND N == V, then move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_LE
      LOAD_PC_PTR_LE If !(Z == 0 AND N == V), then move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_LT
      LOAD_PC_PTR_LT If N != V, then move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_MI
      LOAD_PC_PTR_MI If N == 1, then move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_NE
      LOAD_PC_PTR_NE If Z == 0, then move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_PL
      LOAD_PC_PTR_PL If N == 0, then move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_VC
      LOAD_PC_PTR_VC If V == 0, then move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_VS
      LOAD_PC_PTR_VS If V == 1, then move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_REG
      LOAD_PC_REG Move the register value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_REG_NZ
      LOAD_PC_REG_NZ If the register isn't zero, then move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_PC_REG_Z
      LOAD_PC_REG_Z If the register is zero, then move the pointer value into PC
      class  Controller.LOAD_REG_PTR
      LOAD_REG_PTR Move the value of the pointer immediate into the register

      NOP The RTN for doing nothing with the processor.
